content.rendered:
Sonic Classic Heroes

Description

Sonic Classic Heroes is an adventure game created for Sega Mega Drive and it’s now available for PC as well. Travel through the Emerald Isles and beat the evil forces of Dr. Robotnik. Collect gold rings and try to avoid all kind of obstacles on your way.

You can play as a team and switch between characters. Each of them has its own unique super power.

Teams
Team Sonic: Sonic the Hedgehog, Miles “Tails” Prower and Knuckles the Echidna.
Team Chaotix: Espio the Chameleon, Vector the Crocodile and Charmy the Bee.

Developer

Sonic Classic Heroes is developed by Sonic Team and published by Sega for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis in 1991.

Gameplay
